tsjsonc 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Package index

Quickstart

  • See quickstart for a quick demonstration of tsjsonc.
  • See ts_serialize_jsonc() to create JSON from R.
  • See ts_unserialize_jsonc() to parse JSON into R.
  • See ts_parse_jsonc(), ts_tree_select(), and ts_tree_unserialize() to parse parts of JSON into R.
  • See ts_parse_jsonc(), ts_tree_select(), ts_tree_format(), and ts_save_json() to format parts of a JSON file or string and save it to a file.
  • See ts_parse_jsonc(), ts_read_jsonc(), ts_tree_select(), ts_tree_delete(), ts_tree_insert(), ts_tree_update(), and ts_tree_write() to edit a JSON file or string and save it to a file.

Parsing

ts_parse_jsonc() ts_read_jsonc()
Parse a JSON file or string into a tsjsonc object
ts_language_jsonc()
Tree sitter language object for JSONC

Selection

ts_tree_select()
Select parts of a JSONC tree-sitter tree.

Serialization

ts_serialize_jsonc()
Serialize an R object to JSON
ts_unserialize_jsonc()
Unserialize a JSON file or string into an R object

Formatting

ts_format_jsonc()
Format a JSONC file

Options

tsjsonc_options
tsjsonc options
